default: Thanks for coming all the way out here, Agent. We're in a pickle right now.
Search the building and help me find the Chief.
police chief: Chief is locked in the jail cell? Here's the JAIL KEYS...
get jail keys: This has to be the third time the Chief's got stuck in there this year...
use jail keys chief: Thanks a lot for your help today. I don't know what we'd have done without you.
use jail keys stinky: Why did you free the suspect in cell 1? I trust your judgement, but your methods are unorthodox.
